alert.note: Alert for Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 5:54PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pike County through 630 PM CDT... At 554 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Daisy, or 11 miles east of Umpire, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Daisy... Narrows Dam... Daisy State Park... Bear Creek Public Use Area... New Hope in Pike County... Langley... Nathan... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
